WorkItem.Description: Add support for the SVG <image/> element. Attached is basic support, but doesn't implement the preserveAspectRatio element. It parses it, and you'll see a placeholder for it, I just didn't acutally implement the resize. Shouldn't be hard to do, there's a marker in the code where we create the actual Image object, so the resize just needs to go there.

Comments.Message: Also, I've only tested with remote URLs (http://...). According to the SVG spec, it should support relative urls as well, but that's tricky since we're not working on the web here.
